lead_paragraph: Former Most Valuable Player Kevin Durant is joining the Golden State Warriors, giving the team perhaps the best consolation prize they could have hoped for after losing the NBA Finals in crushing fashion last month.

headline.print_headline: Durant Leaving Thunder to Team Up With Curry's Warriors
headline.main: Durant Leaving Thunder to Team Up With Curry's Warriors
